Name: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will - Core
Description: The Core Passive [Blade Will] lasts for [infinite] time instead. The Blade Will only ends when the [Character leaves the field].

Name: Frederick
Description: Gains 15% movement speed and 5% Extra DMG Bonus for 5s after every dodge. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration. The next successful dodge will reduce the attacker's speed by 20% and Extra DMG Reduction by 15% for 4s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Patton
Description: CRIT Rate increases by 5%. Physical DMG increases by 5%. Non-CRIT Physical DMG gains 2% CRIT Rate, up to 20%. The effect will reset upon CRIT DMG. Upon CRIT DMG, Physical DMG will increase by 5%. The effect lasts 3s and can be stacked up to 3 times. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Darwin
Description: Every 1 orb pinged makes Extra DMG Bonus increase by 3% for 4s, stacking up to 5 times. Mark a color after pinging orbs of this particular color. When all 3 colors have been marked, unleash a Shockwave dealing 600% Physical DMG and reset the marks.

Name: Final Radiance
Description: Upon receiving [lethal damage], becomes immune to the damage and [restore all HP]. After that, loses 10% max HP every second and gains 10% DMG Bonus. Will not lose HP when leaving the field.

Name: Life Drain
Description: Restores HP equal to 1% of DMG dealt.

Name: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will - Overclock 1
Description: Swordwave Orbs can trigger QTEs.

Name: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will - Overclock 2
Description: Automatically recovers one Swordwave Orb every [2]s.

Name: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will - Evolve
Description: When Swordwave Orbs are pinged, 2 extra swordwaves will be cast on the sides that deal the same DMG as the original swordwave does.

Name: Open Fire - Attacker
Description: Deals [10% more DMG] for [every] available Signal Orb.

Name: Crimson Abyss - Entrance Skill
Description: Enters [Matrix] without triggering its cooldown upon being deployed on the field.

Name: Frederick
Description: Gains 15% movement speed and 5% Extra DMG Bonus for 5s after every dodge. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration. The next successful dodge will reduce the attacker's speed by 20% and Extra DMG Reduction by 15% for 4s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Patton
Description: CRIT Rate increases by 5%. Physical DMG increases by 5%. Non-CRIT Physical DMG gains 2% CRIT Rate, up to 20%. The effect will reset upon CRIT DMG. Name: Final Radiance
Description: Upon receiving lethal damage, becomes immune to the damage and restore all HP. After that, loses 10% max HP every second and gains 10% DMG Bonus, during which time becomes immune to damage and healing.

Name: Life Drain
Description: Restores HP equal to 1% of DMG dealt.

Name: Signal Echoes
Description: All team members randomly gain 3 Signal Orbs of the same color upon entering the field. (This effect can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Overload
Description: All team members gain 50% DMG Bonus for 10s upon entering the field. (This effect can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Crimson Abyss - Departure Skill
Description: Upon leaving the field, summons Unknown Construct α to cast Swordwave(s). [Each summon will increase the number of Swordwaves cast.]

Name: Open Fire - Attacker
Description: Deals [10% more DMG] for [every] available Signal Orb.

Name: Cosmos Shock - Core
Description: Upon triggering the Core Passive [Cosmos Shock], damaging enemies will also mark them. When marked enemies are damaged by 3-Ping skills, their marks will be consumed to spawn a shade that casts the same skill.

Name: Bathlon
Description: ATK increases by 3%. Dark DMG increases by 7%. Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a Dark Area for 5s. Attacks on targets within the area have a 20% chance to grant 1 Signal Orb and have a 12-second cooldown. Meanwhile, reduces Corrupted targets' Dark DMG Resistance by 8%.

Name: Darwin
Description: Every 1 orb pinged makes Extra DMG Bonus increase by 3% for 4s, stacking up to 5 times. Mark a color after pinging orbs of this particular color. When all 3 colors have been marked, unleash a Shockwave dealing 600% Physical DMG and reset the marks.

Name: Kuriko
Description: Pings grant 20% more Energy. The Signature Move consumes 20% less Energy. Upon casting the Signature Move, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 10s. Meanwhile, gains Super Armor and 20% Extra DMG Reduction for 5s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Final Radiance
Description: Upon receiving lethal damage, becomes immune to the damage and restore all HP. After that, loses 10% max HP every second and gains 10% DMG Bonus, during which time becomes immune to damage and healing.

Name: Life Drain
Description: Restores HP equal to 1% of DMG dealt.

Name: Cosmos Shock - Overclock 1
Description: Gains two Red Orbs upon casting any 3-Ping.

Name: Cosmos Shock - Overclock 2
Description: Upon casting the Core Passive [Cosmos Shock], rearranges all Signal Orbs and gains one Red Orb

Name: Cosmos Shock - Evolve
Description: The Core Passive [Cosmos Shock] will blind the enemies upon dealing damage to them, making their attacks have a 50% chance to miss and making them receive 20% more Dark DMG for 5s. Cooldown: 10s.

Name: Open Fire - Attacker
Description: Deals 10% more DMG for every available Signal Orb.

Name: Astral - Entrance Skill
Description: Every time upon entering the field, summons one Construct Soldier to assist your team, up to 3 Construct Soldiers in total.

Name: Open Fire - Attacker

Name: EX - Slash Storm - Core
Description: Upon casting the Core Passive [EX - Slash Storm], Nanami will automatically cast the Core Passive Skill again. The effect lasts up to 10s. When the skill is active, Nanami will slow down by 70%. Dodging or casting the Signature Move will interrupt the skill.

Name: Patton
Description: CRIT Rate increases by 5%. Physical DMG increases by 5%. Non-CRIT Physical DMG gains 2% CRIT Rate, up to 20%. The effect will reset upon CRIT DMG. Upon CRIT DMG, Physical DMG will increase by 5%. The effect lasts 3s and can be stacked up to 3 times. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Hanna
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings increases by 25%. For every 30s, enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Catherine
Description: QTE and 3-Ping skills decrease target's Physical DEF by 20% for 8s, 10s Cooldown. When damaged, gain a Shield with HP equivalent to 20% of own DEF and increase own Physical DMG by 15% for 5s, 8s Cooldown.

Name: Phase Shift
Description: Upon taking damage from an enemy, becomes immune to damage from the enemy for 2s. Cooldown: 5s.

Name: Barrier
Description: Every 10s, gains a Shield equal to 20% of max HP if doesn't have one.

Name: EX - Slash Storm - Overclock 1
Description: Upon casting the Core Passive [EX - Slash Storm], gains 80% Extra DMG Reduction.

Name: EX - Slash Storm - Overclock 2
Description: When casting the Core Passive [EX - Slash Storm], gains 10% Extra DMG Bonus every second, up to 100%. Removes the Extra DMG Bonus at the end of the skill duration.

Name: EX - Slash Storm - Evolve
Description: When casting the Core Passive [EX - Slash Storm], summons one Tornado every 2s. Each Tornado deals Physical DMG equal to 100% ATK every second.

Name: Open Fire - Tank
Description: Deals 2% more DMG for every 1% Dodge value.

Name: Storm - Entrance Skill
Description: Upon entering the field, summons Polar Bear - Martin to assist, freezing all enemies on the field and deals damage equal to 7% max HP.

Name: Storm - Departure Skill
Description: Upon leaving the field, summons one Tornado that deals damage over time and reduces the enemy's Physical Resistance. The effect lasts 7s.

Name: Fighting Will - Core
Description: Upon casting a 3-Ping, additionally clears up to 3 Signal Orbs of the same color among the orbs owned. Each Signal Orb cleared will increase the damage of this 3-Ping by 40% and grant 5 more Energy.

Name: Tenebrion - Entrance Skill

Description: Deals 2% more DMG for every 1% Dodge value.

Name: Laser Cluster - Core
Description: Upon casting the Core Passive [Laser Cluster], replacing all the Signal Orbs with Red Orbs. The effect lasts 8s. At the end of the effect, replaces all the Signal Orbs with random orbs.

Name: Laser Cluster - Overclock 1
Description: Upon casting the Core Passive [Laser Cluster], gains one Signal Orb of each of the three colors.

Name: Laser Cluster - Overclock 2
Description: After the Core Passive [Laser Cluster] deals damage to the enemy, each attack will increase the damage of the subsequent Laser Cluster to the enemy by 2%, up to 200%.

Name: Laser Cluster - Evolve
Description: Upon casting the Core Passive [Laser Cluster] the 3rd time, casts the Advanced Laser to deal 2000% True DMG to all enemies hit.
